mil5.2.2:1.2: ‘natthananda, tathagatassa dhammesu acariyamutthi’ti, puna ca therena malukyaputtena panham puttho na byakasi.
mil5.2.2:1.3: Eso kho, bhante nagasena, panho dvayanto ekantanissito bhavissati ajananena va guyhakaranena va.
mil5.2.2:1.5: ‘natthananda, tathagatassa dhammesu acariyamutthi’ti, tena hi therassa malukyaputtassa ajanantena na byakatam.
mil5.2.2:1.6: Yadi janantena na byakatam, tena hi atthi tathagatassa dhammesu acariyamutthi.
mil5.2.2:1.7: Ayampi ubhato kotiko panho tavanuppatto, so taya nibbahitabbo”ti.
mil5.2.2:2.1: “Bhasitampetam, maharaja, bhagavata ‘natthananda, tathagatassa dhammesu acariyamutthi’ti, abyakato ca therena malukyaputtena pucchito panho, tanca pana na ajanantena na guyhakaranena.
mil5.2.2:2.4: Ekamsabyakaraniyo panho vibhajjabyakaraniyo panho patipucchabyakaraniyo panho thapaniyo panhoti.
mil5.2.2:3.6: ‘vinnanam aniccan’ti ekamsabyakaraniyo panho, ayam ekamsabyakaraniyo panho.
mil5.2.2:4.6: ‘aniccam pana vinnanan’ti vibhajjabyakaraniyo panho, ayam vibhajjabyakaraniyo panho.
mil5.2.2:5.2: ‘Kim nu kho cakkhuna sabbam vijanati’ti ayam patipucchabyakaraniyo panho.
mil5.2.2:6.12: ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathagato param marana’ti,
mil5.2.2:6.13: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’ti thapaniyo panho,
mil5.2.2:7.1: Bhagava, maharaja, therassa malukyaputtassa tam thapaniyam panham na byakasi.
mil5.2.2:7.3: Na tassa dipanaya hetu va karanam va atthi, tasma so panho thapaniyo.
